The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: May 12, 2023
  • Developer: Nintendo EPD
  • Publisher: Nintendo
  • Platform: Nintendo Switch
  • Genre: Action-Adventure
  • Price: £59.99

Game Description

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the highly anticipated sequel to Breath of the Wild, taking place in the expanded world of Hyrule. Players explore both the surface world and the mysterious Sky Islands, using new abilities to craft, combine, and create solutions to puzzles and challenges.

Key Features

  • Expanded Hyrule with Sky Islands
  • New abilities: Ultrahand, Fuse, Recall, and Ascend
  • Enhanced crafting and building mechanics
  • Deeper story and lore
  • Improved combat system
  • Vast underground areas to explore

New Abilities

Ultrahand

Build and combine objects to create vehicles and structures.

Fuse

Combine items with weapons for unique effects.

Recall & Ascend

Manipulate time and traverse vertically through solid surfaces.

Begin Your New Adventure

Explore the expanded kingdom of Hyrule!
